content.en: Algorithmic optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms to optimize the design and performance of various types of electric machines. For example, a genetic algorithm optimization is used to find the optimal design and performance analysis of a double stator multi-excitation flux-switching machine. Similarly, a differential evolution algorithm is employed to compare and design optimize a five-phase flux-switching PM machine for in-wheel traction applications. These algorithms help researchers find the best solutions for improving the efficiency and performance of electric machines.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere design og ydeevne af forskellige typer elektriske maskiner. For eksempel anvendes en genetisk algoritmeoptimering til at finde det optimale design og ydeevneanalyse af en dobbelt stator multi-excitations flux-switching maskine. Ligeledes bruges en differentiel evolutionsalgoritme til at sammenligne og designoptimere en femfaset flux-switching PM maskine til hjulnavstraktionsapplikationer. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at finde de bedste løsninger til at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af elektriske maskiner.
